row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "TAR File" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_ZIP_FILE# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_ZIP_FILE#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_ZIP_FILE# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_ZIP_FILE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_ZIP_FILE#" :SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REV(&UC4RB_CHECKME#, "/") :IF &POS# > 0 : SET &DIRECTORY# = MID(&UC4RB_CHECKME#, 1, &POS#) : SET &POS# = ADD(&POS#, 1) : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = MID(&UC4RB_CHECKME#, &POS#) cd "&DIRECTORY#" :ENDIF zip_file=`ls | grep -i &UC4RB_CHECKME#`
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&DIRECTORY#$zip_file" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@UNIX
errors=0
if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "TAR File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "The package '&UC4RB_ZIP_FILE#' doesn't exist." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR errors=1 fi
! Check EXT: in value :IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 exit 100; :ENDIF
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] ; then exit $errors; fi
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!:SET &UC4RB_ZIP_FILE# = STR_LC(&UC4RB_ZIP_FILE#) :SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REV(&UC4RB_ZIP_FILE#, "/") :IF &POS# > 0 : SET &DIRECTORY# = MID(&UC4RB_ZIP_FILE#, 1, &POS#) : SET &POS# = ADD(&POS#, 1) : SET &UC4RB_ZIP_FILE# = MID(&UC4RB_ZIP_FILE#, &POS#) cd "&DIRECTORY#" :ENDIF
!Select target if have :SET &TARGET# = "" :IF &UC4RB_TARGET_DIR# <> "" mkdir -p &UC4RB_TARGET_DIR# : SET &TARGET# = STR_CAT("&TARGET#", " -C &UC4RB_TARGET_DIR#") :ENDIF
gunzip -c `ls | grep -i &UC4RB_ZIP_FILE#` | tar xvf -&TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
